程序包 ca.sheridancollege.zhang240.controllers

类 HomeController

java.lang.Object
ca.sheridancollege.zhang240.controllers.HomeController
@Controller public class HomeController extends Object
Process web requests: login, logout insert, update, and delete courses.
作者:
Yue Zhang

    Navigation to delete page(secure and ADMIN only)

    Deletes a course by selecting course id from the dropdown list Show all courses before and after deletion

  • 方法详细资料

    • index

      @GetMapping("/") public String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Course course)
      Set index page(public) as / page. Shows all courses on this page

    • login

      @GetMapping("/login") public String login()
      Navigation to login page(public)

    • permissionDenied

      @GetMapping("/permission-denied") public String permissionDenied()
      Navigation to error page(public)

    • insert

      @GetMapping("/secure/insert") public String insert(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Course course)
      Navigation to insert page(secure)

    • delete

      @GetMapping("/secure/delete") public String delete(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Course course)
      Navigation to delete page(secure and ADMIN only)

    • update

      @GetMapping("/secure/update") public String update(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Course course)
      Navigation to update page(secure)

    • insertCourse

      @PostMapping("/insertCourse") public String insertCourse(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute Course course)
      Inserts a new course based on form input. Show all courses after insert

    • deleteCourse

      @GetMapping("/deleteCourse") public String deleteCourse(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam("id") Long id)
      Deletes a course by selecting course id from the dropdown list Show all courses before and after deletion

    • updateCourse

      @PostMapping("/updateCourse") public String updateCourse(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam("id") Long id, @RequestParam("price") Double price)
      Update the price of a course by selecting course id from the dropdown list Show all courses before and after deletion
